<title>The Promise | Bruce Springsteen</title>
<meta name="robots" content="index, follow, max-snippet:-1, max-image-preview:large, max-video-preview:-1" />

<meta property="og:locale" content="en_US" />
<meta property="og:type" content="article" />
<meta property="og:title" content="The Promise" />
<meta property="og:description" content="Previously unreleased tracks from the 1977-'78 recording sessions include long-missed studio versions of such live standards as "Because the Night," "Fire," and Springsteen's most celebrated outtake, "The Promise." Finished in some cases with modern vocals and additional instrumentation, they form a "lost album" between Born to Run and Darkness." />
<meta property="og:url" content="https://brucespringsteen.net/albums/the-promise/" />

yoast_head_json.title: The Promise | Bruce Springsteen
yoast_head_json.og_description: Previously unreleased tracks from the 1977-'78 recording sessions include long-missed studio versions of such live standards as "Because the Night," "Fire," and Springsteen's most celebrated outtake, "The Promise." Finished in some cases with modern vocals and additional instrumentation, they form a "lost album" between Born to Run and Darkness.
yoast_head_json.twitter_description: Previously unreleased tracks from the 1977-'78 recording sessions include long-missed studio versions of such live standards as "Because the Night," "Fire," and Springsteen's most celebrated outtake, "The Promise." Finished in some cases with modern vocals and additional instrumentation, they form a "lost album" between Born to Run and Darkness.
